description: This week's column has everything you need to know about retinol in skincare. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Back To Basics: Retinoids may improve skin when used the right way
title_page: Back To Basics: Retinoids may improve skin when used the right way | The Straits Times
maintext:
Victoria Beckham swears by it. So does Nicole Kidman, Jennifer Lopez, Kim Kardashian and a legion of other celebrities.
We are talking about vitamin A in skincare.
